name: Game where you are connected to a bullet that can teleport
name_original: Game where you are connected to a bullet that can teleport
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2021 Submission - Concept: Joined Together

Based on the magic teleporting weapon of Final Fantasy XV, a game where you warp, swap your way to your goal. Bounce you weapon off hard wall, swap place with an enemy. Try your best to reach the goal!!

My first project.
